boardgame.name: The Red Dragon Inn 2
The Red Dragon Inn II
Zum Blauen Drachen
Таверна «Красный дракон»: Дварф, бард и медовуха
レッドドラゴン・イン2
boardgame.description: The Red Dragon Inn 2 is a standalone game that can be combined with the original The Red Dragon Inn to create adventuring parties of up to eight drunken players. The Red Dragon Inn 2 includes its own drink deck, player mats, counters, Gold, markers, and the following heroic adventurers:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dimli the Dwarf: Grumpy, but tough and loyal, Dimli always seems to have a stash of gold secreted away somewhere. He can pretty much drink anyone else under the table. He's really, really good with his matched set of dwarven axes. He's not so good with darts, though. When he starts playing, duck. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Eve the Illusionist: Eve defies description, mostly because we don't know what she really looks like. Her powers of illusion have saved her friends countless times from the extremely gullible monsters of the deep dungeon. She's been known to use her skills on her fellow party members when she gets bored. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Fleck the Bard: Fleck is a dashing half-elf, ready with a smile or a song. His heroic tales and stirring lute-playing raises his friends' spirits, filling them with courage as they face the horrors of the deep dungeon. Fleck is always up for carousing, no matter the day or night. All the girls think he's so dreamy. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Gog the Half-Ogre: A hulking brute from the flinty mountains who unfortunately doesn't know his own strength. He's not the brightest torch in the dungeon, but he's a nice guy and he tries hard. Never, ever dance with Gog._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

SlugFest Games (SFG007) Once again you and your adventuring companions have spent all day slogging through the Dungeon, killing monsters and taking their stuff! Now you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re back in town, healed up, cleaned up, and ready to party at the Red Dragon Inn with four new members of the party! Drink, gamble, and roughhouse with your friends. But don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t forget to keep an eye on your Gold. If you run out, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to spend the night in the stables. Oh... and try not to get too beaten up or too drunk. If you black out, your friends will continue the party without you... after they loot your body for Gold of course! The last conscious adventurer with Gold wins the game! The Red Dragon Inn 2 introduces four new members of the party and can be played alone or in combination with The Red Dragon Inn to allow for games of up to 8 players! So, take on the role of one of these heroic fantasy adventurers - Gog, Fleck, Eve, or Dimli - and enjoy an evening at the Red Dragon Inn!

But don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t forget to keep an eye on your Gold. If you run out, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to spend the night in the stables. Oh... and try not to get too beaten up or too drunk. If you black out, your friends will continue the party without you... after they loot your body for Gold of course! The last conscious adventurer with Gold wins the game! The Red Dragon Inn 2 introduces four new members of the party and can be played alone or in combination with The Red Dragon Inn to allow for games of up to 8 players! So, take on the role of one of these heroic fantasy adventurers - Gog, Fleck, Eve, or Dimli - and enjoy an evening at the Red Dragon Inn!

Description: Red Dragon Inn 2 mint/sealed - not sure which edition, but as it was purchased recently I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d guess English 5th... if this is important please let me know how to tell based on the box_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s exterior] Shipping Weight: 4 lbs Orders are usually shipped within one business day of receiving payment. You can calculate the shipping cost at usps.com / ups.com by choosing 60134 as the sending zip code and adding the weights of all games purchased together (yes, we do combine items for shipping so take a look at our other games as the cost of shipping that second or third game is small compared to the first one) and adding 1 pound for packaging materials. I will ship via whatever method you prefer. International buyers please note... shipping overseas is EXPENSIVE. For that first game (unless it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s tiny) it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be no less than $30... additional games don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t add much to that, but shipping just one game is costly. Please be aware of that before placing an order.
